summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 7, Pettit's University Addition, being the alley between 11th Avenue Northeast and 12th Avenue Northeast, from East 47th Street to East 50th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 105144 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
